channel.title: CVE Feed for Eclipse Foundation -- OpenJ9
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Eclipse Foundation -- OpenJ9

item.title: CVE-2023-5676|2023-11-15T14:02:01.422Z -- eclipse%20foundation -- openj9
item.description: In Eclipse OpenJ9 before version 0.41.0, the JVM can be forced into an infinite busy hang on a spinlock or a segmentation fault if a shutdown signal (SIGTERM, SIGINT or SIGHUP) is received before the JVM has finished initializing.
